definition[0]: someone who is in charge of a project, group of workers etc, and who makes sure that the job is done properly
definition[1]: a person or organization whose job is to check that an activity is being performed honestly and legally
example[0]: the overseer of the privatisation process.
definition[2]: a person or organization appointed by a court to deal with the affairs of a bankrupt company
definition[3]: someone in charge of a group of workers, who checks their work is done properly
example[1]: The overseers had exactly twice the labourersâ€™ pay.
